mapper.select: select * from client cl, contract co where cl.client_no = co.client_no and client_sign <> 'N' and emp_sign <> 'N' and cl.emp_no = #{emp_no} and co.emp_no = #{emp_no} and client_delete = 'N' order by contract_date_start desc

select * from (select rownum rnum, list.contract_money, list.client_name, list.client_company, list.client_phone, list.contract_discount, list.contract_date_start, list.contract_date_end, list.client_delete, list.client_no from (select co.contract_money, cl.client_name, cl.client_company, cl.client_phone, co.contract_discount, co.contract_date_start, co.contract_date_end, cl.client_delete, cl.client_no from client cl, contract co where cl.client_no = co.client_no and client_sign <> 'N' and emp_sign <> 'N' and cl.emp_no = #{emp_no} and co.emp_no = #{emp_no} and client_delete = 'N' order by contract_date_start desc) list where rownum >= 1) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow} and client_delete <> 'Y'
select * from client cl, contract co where cl.client_no = co.client_no and cl.client_no = #{client_no} and cl.client_delete = 'N'
select contract_discount from contract where client_no = #{client_no}
